Name: WeightsAndBiases
Description: Module that uploads data to Weights and Biases

Properties.Name: currentRun
Properties.Description: Current run. Holds functions and data corresponding to the current episode.

Functions.Name: startOfEpisode

MandatoryArgs.Name: episodeIndex
MandatoryArgs.Description: Index of the episode. Used for referring to TrainingEpisode generation parameters.

Functions.Description: Is called at the beginning of each TrainingEpisode run. Used to start new WandB run.

Functions.Name: endOfIteration

MandatoryArgs.Name: trainingError
MandatoryArgs.Description: The error on the training batch.

MandatoryArgs.Name: iterationTime
MandatoryArgs.Description: The time taken for the training.

Functions.Description: Is called at the end of each training iteration. Used to upload training data to WandB.

Functions.Name: endOfCrossVal
Functions.Description: Is called at end of cross validation. Used to upload cross val error progress to WandB.

Functions.Name: endOfEpisode
Functions.Description: Is called at the end of each TrainingEpisode run. Is used to close WandB run.
